name: sultrily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an attractive, sexual way: She posed with her hands on her hips and looked sultrily towards the camera. In those photos, he still had strong cheekbones, and his lip still curled sultrily.
More examplesFewer examplesTheir music is like salsa slowed down to a sultrily throbbing beat.Mario scowled sultrily and started to sing "Burning Love".The song "He's a Tramp" was sultrily sung by the wonderful Peggy Lee.
Related word
sultry
